features: 2-in-1 Shave Gel + Skin Care leaves skin feeling smooth, cool and refreshed
Comfortable skin before, during and after the shave
Gel gauge lets you see when the gel product is running out
body.description: Gillette Fusion ProGlide Ocean Breeze 2-in-1 Shave Gel + Skin Care leaves sensitive skin feeling smooth, cool and refreshed. This unique 2-in-1 formula combines Gillette’s best shave gel with the feeling of a cooling aftershave for incredible skin comfort before, during and after your shave. To feel just-shaved smooth all day, use with a Gillette Fusion ProGlide FlexBall razor.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gillette Fusion Proglide Sensitive 2-in-1 Gel + Skin Care The Gillette Fusion ProGlide Sensitive Shave Gel canister has three major innovations that set it apart from other shave gels: a clean-dispense actuator, a rust-free bottom, and a gel gauge. The result is no mess, no rust, and no guessing. The 2-in-1 formula pairs shave gel with powerful skin care. Plus, you get a smooth shave from start to finish with a specialized formula that hydrates to soften hair, protects your skin, and improves razor glide for an incredible shave. Our revolutionary canister design provides a superior shaving experience with its clean-dispense actuator, rust-free bottom, and gel gauge. No Mess. No Rust. No Guessing Clean-dispense actuator creates less waste Gel gauge lets you see when the gel is running out Rust-free canister doesn’t leave a ring 2-in-1 shave gel with skin care leaves skin feeling soft and smooth Safe for sensitive skin

Product Features No Mess The clean-dispense actuator cap locks closed to stop excess gel from escaping the canister. The result is less mess, less waste, and a cleaner bathroom. No Rust Gillette's commitment to a smarter, cleaner shaving experience brings you a canister that won't rust and won't leave a ring behind. No Guessing The innovative canister design includes a gel gauge window so that you can determine exactly how much gel you have left. Take control of your morning and never let an empty can take you by surprise. 2-in-1 Shave Gel With Skin Care Our 2-in-1 formula provides our best shave gel combined with powerful skin care that leaves your skin feeling smooth, soft, cool, and refreshed.

Frequently Asked Questions What is the difference between foam and gel? Gillette believes a man should have options. However, even though both gels and foams are effective at giving you a comfortable shave, Gillette Fusion ProGlide Sensitive Shave Gel contains hydrating emollients and lubricating ingredients. By helping to lock in moisture and soften facial hair, you get smoother razor glide and less tugging of the hair for a more comfortable shave versus Gillette foam. What is the difference between shaving with shave gel and shaving with soap and water? Shave gel tends to be less drying than ordinary soap and water and won’t clog your razor the way soap can. Shave gels help retain skin moisture, making hair easier to cut. Gillette Fusion ProGlide Sensitive Shave Gel is available in several varieties. How does 2-in-1 shave gel with skin care work? 2-in-1 shave gel with skin care has three effective lubricants, which enhance razor glide for a smooth, comfortable shave that helps protect your skin against nicks, redness, and tightness. What is a clean-dispense actuator? The clean-dispense actuator allows you to lock the gel actuator closed by turning the head into the locked position. This prevents excess gel from being extruded, resulting in a cleaner canister and less waste. What is a gel gauge? The innovative gel gauge indicates clearly to you how much gel is left in the canister. Now there is no need to guess how much gel remains in the can, and that means no more missed shaves.

Frequently Asked Questions What is the difference between foam and gel? Gillette believes a man should have options. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and Refreshing Shave
reviews.reviewText: The Gillette Fusion ProGlide Sensitive 2 in 1 Shave Gel has become my go-to choice for a smooth and refreshing shaving experience.As someone with sensitive skin, finding the right shave gel that provides a close shave without irritation has been a challenge. However, this shave gel exceeded my expectations in every way.The 2 in 1 formula is a time-saving convenience, as it combines both the shave gel and skin care benefits in one product. This Active Sport variant leaves my skin feeling invigorated and refreshed after every shave.The gel texture glides effortlessly across my skin, ensuring a smooth shave without any nicks or cuts.I was impressed with how well it works with my Gillette Fusion ProGlide razor, creating a seamless duo that delivers an exceptionally close shave.The pack of 2, with 12 oz each, provides excellent value for the price, making it a long-lasting addition to my grooming routine.Moreover, the subtle and refreshing fragrance adds a pleasant touch to the overall shaving experience.In conclusion, the Gillette Fusion ProGlide Sensitive 2 in 1 Shave Gel is a game-changer for anyone seeking a smooth and irritation-free shaving experience. Its 2 in 1 formula and refreshing Active Sport variant make it the perfect companion for a hassle-free and enjoyable shave. If you're looking for a shave gel that delivers exceptional results without irritating your skin, this Gillette shave gel is the ultimate choice. Embrace the confidence and comfort it brings to your shaving routine, knowing that you're using a top-notch product from a trusted brand. I highly recommend the Gillette Fusion ProGlide Sensitive 2 in 1 Shave Gel for its excellent performance and convenience, making it a must-have addition to your grooming essentials!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well, Easy to use. Nozzle tends to leak. Nozzle Requires rinsing after obtaining shaving cream & rinsing again after shaving and closing the top..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023

reviews.reviewText: J'adore ce gel ainsi que le parfum qu'il dégage. Excellent pour les peaux sensibles et je peux vous affirmer que c'est VRAI car moi-même j'ai une peau extremement sensible et avec ce gel, wowww aucune irritation du visage. Mais j'utilise Gillette comme rasoir et j'en suis très heureux MERCI
